page.title: 13Markets in Banbury
page.content: The Cattle Market is on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays. The main one is on Thursdays. The cattle market is at the end of Merton Road, near the railway station. This market is run by Midland Marts and is the biggest cattle market in Europe. A farmer can not only buy animals but also machinery too, like tractors. The farmer brings his livestock into market and sells and buys new things. On the main market day the buses go to all the little villages like Horley and bring the people to Banbury. There is another market on Thursdays and Saturdays in the market place near the town hall and shopping centre. It sells toys, clothes, fruit, vegetables, books, sweets and all sorts of things.
